metadata.title: Friday, 6th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    what the cause of the riots in Roan and Mpatamatu townships in Luanshya District on Friday, 30th October, 2015, was; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to ensure that similar incidences do not recur.

(a)    whether the Government has allowed the Forum for Democracy and Development (FDD), a political party to operate a programme, similar to the Government operated Farmer Input Support Programme (FISP);
(b)    if so, under what legal framework the FDD is operating its programme; and
(c)    whether the FDD’s programme will not interfere with the Government-run FISP.
(a)    when the grading of the following feeder roads in Mporokoso Parliamentary Constituency, by the Zambia National Service will commence:
(i)    Melu to Mutitima; (ii)    Bulangililo to Kabusha; (iii)    Chishamwamba to Mulubwa via Njalamimba; and (iv)    Mporokoso to Nsunge via Kambobe; and
(b)    what the cause of the delay in grading the above roads, is.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Child  Development
parts: (a)    when the construction of Samfya and Chisangwa Youth Resource Centres in Bangweulu Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b)    what has caused the delay in completing the works; and
(c)    whether the designs for the two Centres have been approved by Government.
